decision_conditions: The amendments to the approved application listed below are considered to be of a minor nature and acceptable in their own right and will not require resubmission of a fresh planning application.
The following amendments are deemed to be accepted:
*Internal layout changes (location of ground floor WC and first floor bathroom/room partitions

*Addition of external ASHPs to each property (provided that they are designed to comply with Microgeneration Installation Standard: MCS 020 along with the full requirements of Schedule 2 Part 14 Class G of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015).

*Minor external landscape changes -extent of front driveway reduced/landscape planting increased/driveway levels added, boundary walls and fences amended - frontage boundary wall and railing/driveway gates omitted.
* Bollards added to woodland frontage to prevent vehicle access

ASHPs as indicated must be designed to comply fully with the provisions of Schedule 2 Part 14 Class G of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 in its entirety including the Microgeneration Installation Standard: MCS 020 as they would otherwise require separate planning permission.
The minor-amendment is considered on the basis that there would be compliance with this design and technical standard and does not permit otherwise.
description:
Application for a non-material amendment to Planning Permission ref: P1836.17 dated 15/02/2021 to allow for revised layout with an amendment rear boundary to the houses (Construction of five residential units with off-street parking and garages and private amenity space.)

*Internal layout changes (location of ground floor WC and first floor bathroom/room partitions
* Canopies over front doors altered
*Siting of cycle and refuse storage 
*Addition of external ASHPs to each property (to comply with Schedule 2 Part 14 Class G of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 in its entirety including the Microgeneration Installation Standard: MCS 020
*Minor external landscape changes -extent of front driveway reduced/landscape planting increased/driveway levels added, boundary walls and fences amended - frontage boundary wall and railing/driveway gates omitted. 
* Bollards added to woodland frontage to prevent vehicle access
